name: Ruins of Starlight
description:
Story:

One day, Nox found himself in a world different from his own. Looking for a way home he got information about a mysterious object. The star gem.
It's hidden away in dangerous ruins and guarded by threatening monsters.
Hoping it's powers will open up a way back to his world, Nox ventures into the ruins.

Features:
  • Equip 'Fragments' to gain new skills and become stronger.
  • Change your battle style according to the situation.
  • Random order of  rooms and randomized room content.
